name: Netskope
description: This app integrates with the Netskope to execute various investigative and polling actions

list_name.description: Netskope List Name (both URL and file hash)

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Download a quarantined file and upload it to the vault

file.description: ID or quarantined name of the file to download

profile.description: Quarantine profile ID or quarantined profile name

actions.description: Get current SCIM user(s). If no parameter is sent, it will retrieve all users
Get current SCIM group(s). If no parameter is sent, it will retrieve all users
Add or Remove a user from a SCIM group
Run query for events on a given IP
actions.verbose:
• If no "start_time" and "end_time" is provided, the action will take the last 24 hours as the time period.
  • If only "start_time" is provided, current time would be taken as "end_time".
  • If only "end_time" is provided, 24 hours prior to "end_time" would be taken as "start_time".
  • The action only returns page and application events for the given IP.

example_values: Failed getting encryption Key via KMIP
Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/104.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/104.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Total page events: 7, Total application events: 61

actions.verbose:
For manual run and first poll, alerts of the last 24 hours would be ingested. Subsequent polls will ingest new alerts.
Only alerts of type "Malware" will be ingested.

container_count.description: Maximum number of containers to ingest

actions.description: Add an URL to the Netskope URL Blocklist
actions.verbose: This action will add URL value to the configured Splunk SOAR custom list only and that will be reflected in the Netskope after update url action is performed.

actions.description: Remove an URL from the Netskope URL Blocklist
actions.verbose: This action will remove URL value from the configured Splunk SOAR custom list only and that will be reflected in the Netskope after update url action is performed.

example_values: Remove msg: Removed 1 instances of "https://www.example.com:80" from "test_list_netskope_url_list", Total urls: 21

actions.description: Send the url list to Netskope
actions.verbose: This action replaces the URL list of a Netskope server with the configured Splunk SOAR custom URL list.

actions.description: Add a file hash to the Netskope file hash list
actions.verbose: This action will add file hash value to the configured Splunk SOAR custom list only and that will be reflected in the Netskope after update hash action is performed.

actions.description: Remove a hash from the Netskope file hash list
actions.verbose: This action will remove file hash value from the configured Splunk SOAR custom list only and that will be reflected in the Netskope after update hash action is performed.

example_values: Total files: 2, Remove msg: Removed 1 instances of "ba7816bf8f01cfea414140de5dae2223b00361a396177a9cb410ff61f20015ad" from "test_list_netskope_file_list"

actions.description: Send the file hash list to Netskope
actions.verbose: This action replaces the hash list of a Netskope server with the configured Splunk SOAR custom hash list.
